ShoujoKageki:Fall.NAME: Fallen
ShoujoKageki:Fall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Put !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:WhosPromise.NAME: Graceful Duo Spin
ShoujoKageki:WhosPromise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile, then put !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Bridge.NAME: Bridge of Promise
ShoujoKageki:Bridge.DESCRIPTION: Play the top X cards of ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.
ShoujoKageki:Bridge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top X+1 cards of ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:WeKnow.NAME: Stage of Promise
ShoujoKageki:WeKnow.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your hand has the same number of cards as ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Gain [E] [E].
ShoujoKageki:WeKnow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your hand has the same number of cards as ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Gain [E] [E] [E].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your hand has the same number of cards as ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:WeKnowTmp.NAME: Stage of Promise
ShoujoKageki:WeKnowTmp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile next turn.

ShoujoKageki:TowerOfPromise.NAME: Tower of Promise
ShoujoKageki:TowerOfPromise.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw cards from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.
ShoujoKageki:TowerOfPromise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw cards from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile until your hand is full.

ShoujoKageki:MeetAgain.NAME: Reunion
ShoujoKageki:MeetAgain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}. NL Put 1 card into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:MeetAgainTmp.NAME: Reunion
ShoujoKageki:MeetAgainTmp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Put this card into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile after playing.

ShoujoKageki:ChargeStrike.NAME: Charged Strike
ShoujoKageki:ChargeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Target loses !M! Strength this turn.

ShoujoKageki:TwistingStrike.NAME: Twisting Strike
ShoujoKageki:TwistingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put !M! *Sandwich into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:EatTogether.NAME: Let's Eat!
ShoujoKageki:EatTogether.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Retain Strength for !ShoujoKageki:SM! turns.

ShoujoKageki:EatTogetherTmp.NAME: Let's Eat!
ShoujoKageki:EatTogetherTmp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL At the start of each combat, put !M! *Sandwich into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:NeverRetreat02.NAME: Never retreat
ShoujoKageki:NeverRetreat02.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Set Cost to 0 before playing.

ShoujoKageki:SwordUp.NAME: Sword Up
ShoujoKageki:SwordUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

ShoujoKageki:WatchBack.NAME: Backstab
ShoujoKageki:WatchBack.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your hand is full. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your hand is full.

ShoujoKageki:Attack04.NAME: Touchdown
ShoujoKageki:Attack04.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put *Counterattack into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Attack05.NAME: Counterstrike
ShoujoKageki:Attack05.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 3 times. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:Attack06.NAME: Yesterday's Night Sky
ShoujoKageki:Attack06.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from discard pile into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Defend03.NAME: Evade
ShoujoKageki:Defend03.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Put *Confrontation into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Parry.NAME: Parry
ShoujoKageki:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Whenever you gain or lose cards, gain extra !M! block

ShoujoKageki:BackToBack.NAME: Back-to-Back
ShoujoKageki:BackToBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile size times !M!. NL (Deal !D! damage) NL (Max 10 cards)

ShoujoKageki:Snack.NAME: Snacks
ShoujoKageki:Snack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength X times. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
ShoujoKageki:Snack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength X+1 times. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:NotLose.NAME: I Won't Lose
ShoujoKageki:NotLose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Set Cost to 0 before playing.

ShoujoKageki:BringStarlight.NAME: Starlight for Everyone
ShoujoKageki:BringStarlight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL This card gains 1 additional attack for each time it is played in this combat.

ShoujoKageki:Aquarium.NAME: Aquarium
ShoujoKageki:Aquarium.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}, then put !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.
ShoujoKageki:Aquarium.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}, then put !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Must.NAME: Under Tokyo Tower
ShoujoKageki:Must.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Put !M! *Tower *of *Promise into your hand. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:RealTimeAttack.NAME: 观众席是这么近的吗
ShoujoKageki:RealTimeAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL (Damage scales with system time)

ShoujoKageki:OurPromise.NAME: Our Promise
ShoujoKageki:OurPromise.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}. NL Put 2 cards into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:ExchangeFate.NAME: Day of Fate
ShoujoKageki:ExchangeFate.DESCRIPTION: Swap your hand with ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:Rapid.NAME: Rapid Descent
ShoujoKageki:Rapid.DESCRIPTION: Select !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Discard the rest.

ShoujoKageki:OnStage.NAME: I Will Be Myself
ShoujoKageki:OnStage.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile does not have enough cards.

ShoujoKageki:LastWord.NAME: Last Word
ShoujoKageki:LastWord.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if this is the only card out of ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if this is the only card out of ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:StageIsWaitingTmp.NAME: Stage Is Waiting
ShoujoKageki:StageIsWaitingTmp.UPGRADE_CHINESE_DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 ， 沉淀 。 NL 从 约定牌堆 中抽出此牌时，获得 [E] [E] 。
EXTENDED_CHINESE_DESCRIPTION: 约定牌堆 中卡牌数量不足。

ShoujoKageki:Dance.NAME: Dance
ShoujoKageki:Dance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Select !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Sunlight.NAME: Shining Sunlight
ShoujoKageki:Sunlight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When this card is run out, you can retrieve it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The battle ended early, you can retrieve it.
Note: It will also be retrieved when the enemy is killed by the last blow.

ShoujoKageki:Run02.NAME: Huh?
ShoujoKageki:Run02.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain Dexterity equal to Strength. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:NewDay.NAME: New Day
ShoujoKageki:NewDay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Put this card and the next !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} you play into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Ready.NAME: Ready
ShoujoKageki:Ready.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw !ShoujoKageki:SM! cards.

ShoujoKageki:Debut.NAME: Debut
ShoujoKageki:Debut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

ShoujoKageki:Tragedy.NAME: Tragedy
ShoujoKageki:Tragedy.DESCRIPTION: Add *Decay into your pile. NL At the end of combat, obtain a random relic.
ShoujoKageki:Tragedy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add *Injury into your pile. NL At the end of combat, obtain a random relic.

ShoujoKageki:Passion.NAME: Passion
ShoujoKageki:Passion.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, obtain a random relic.

ShoujoKageki:Arrogant.NAME: Arrogant
ShoujoKageki:Arrogant.DESCRIPTION: Innate, ShoujoKageki:Expectation. NL At the end of combat, obtain a random relic.

ShoujoKageki:KillAll.NAME: Kill All
ShoujoKageki:KillAll.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When this card is run out, obtain !M! random relic{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.

ShoujoKageki:Forgive.NAME: "Forgive"
ShoujoKageki:Forgive.DESCRIPTION: ShoujoKageki:Disable !ShoujoKageki:SM! relic{!ShoujoKageki:SM!|>1=s}{@@}, then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

ShoujoKageki:StarGuide.NAME: Guidance of Starlight
ShoujoKageki:StarGuide.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put all your ShoujoKageki:Shine cards into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Exhaust.
ShoujoKageki:StarGuide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile is empty, play your only ShoujoKageki:Shine card as many times as possible.

ShoujoKageki:Star.NAME: Moment of Starlight
ShoujoKageki:Star.DESCRIPTION: Run out your only ShoujoKageki:Shine card outside the ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile and play it an equal number of times.
ShoujoKageki:Star.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Run out your only ShoujoKageki:Shine card outside the ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile and play it an equal number of times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You don't have any ShoujoKageki:Shine cards.
You have too many ShoujoKageki:Shine cards.

ShoujoKageki:Starlight.NAME: Starlight Act One
ShoujoKageki:Starlight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a ShoujoKageki:Shine card, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.

ShoujoKageki:Starlight02.NAME: Starlight Act Two
ShoujoKageki:Starlight02.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a ShoujoKageki:Shine card, play it additional !M! times, then run out its ShoujoKageki:Shine count.

ShoujoKageki:StarFriend.NAME: Stringing Our Friendship
ShoujoKageki:StarFriend.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, obtain ShoujoKageki:Shine-card-reward.

ShoujoKageki:Nonon.NAME: NONNON DAYO
ShoujoKageki:Nonon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Target loses !M! Strength this turn.

ShoujoKageki:NewSituation.NAME: Observation
ShoujoKageki:NewSituation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Put !M! *Sandwich into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Practice.NAME: Martial Arts Practice
ShoujoKageki:Practice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL When this card is run out, heal !M! HP.

ShoujoKageki:Practice2.NAME: Dance Practice
ShoujoKageki:Practice2.DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to the total ShoujoKageki:Shine count of all your cards.
ShoujoKageki:Practice2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to the total ShoujoKageki:Shine count of all your cards plus !M!.

ShoujoKageki:BananaMuffin.NAME: Banana Pancake
ShoujoKageki:BananaMuffin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !ShoujoKageki:SM! temporary Strength. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.

ShoujoKageki:BananaLunch.NAME: Banana Lunch
ShoujoKageki:BananaLunch.DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, add !M! *Sandwich into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Financier.NAME: Banana Financier
ShoujoKageki:Financier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Retain Strength for 1 turn every 2 turns.

ShoujoKageki:CryTmp3.NAME: Trouble
ShoujoKageki:CryTmp3.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Strength, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your current Strength.

ShoujoKageki:CryTmp2.NAME: Trouble
ShoujoKageki:CryTmp2.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your Strength changes, gain block equal to the change times !M!.

ShoujoKageki:CryTmp.NAME: Trouble
ShoujoKageki:CryTmp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever this card is moved between piles, gain !B! block.

ShoujoKageki:OldPlace2.NAME: See You Here Again
ShoujoKageki:OldPlace2.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Retain your Energy, Hand, Block, or Strength for !M! turns.

ShoujoKageki:Spin.NAME: Spin
ShoujoKageki:Spin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this card is moved between piles, increase damage by !M! for this combat.

ShoujoKageki:Continue02.NAME: Endless Stage
ShoujoKageki:Continue02.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

ShoujoKageki:DropFuel.NAME: Drop Fuel
ShoujoKageki:DropFuel.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.
ShoujoKageki:DropFuel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:CarryingGuilt.NAME: Guilty
ShoujoKageki:CarryingGuilt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase damage by !M! for every different ShoujoKageki:Shine card you run out in this game.

ShoujoKageki:Consciousness.NAME: Resolve
ShoujoKageki:Consciousness.UPGRADE_CHINESE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 复制 所有手牌 到 约定牌堆 。 NL 消耗 。
ShoujoKageki:Consciousness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

ShoujoKageki:Attack08.NAME: Not far away
ShoujoKageki:Attack08.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:RevueDuet.NAME: RevueDuet
ShoujoKageki:RevueDuet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put this card into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.
ShoujoKageki:RevueDuet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Copy all your hand into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:Attack09Tmp.NAME: Not far away
ShoujoKageki:Attack09Tmp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put this card into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.
ShoujoKageki:Attack09Tmp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Copy all your hand into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:Gear.NAME: Gears of Destiny
ShoujoKageki:Gear.DESCRIPTION: Copy all your hand into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Exhaust.
ShoujoKageki:Gear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Copy all your hand into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:GearTmp.NAME: Gears of Destiny
ShoujoKageki:GearTmp.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand and add a copy of it into your pile. NL Exhaust.
ShoujoKageki:GearTmp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a card in your hand and add a copy of it into your pile. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:CommonAttack.NAME: Kick
ShoujoKageki:CommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it is a Skill card, draw 1 more card.

ShoujoKageki:CommonDefend.NAME: Stomp
ShoujoKageki:CommonDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it is an Attack card, draw 1 more card.

ShoujoKageki:Letter.NAME: Letter
ShoujoKageki:Letter.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you put a card into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile, gain !M! block.

ShoujoKageki:Burn.NAME: Burn it, Burn it!
ShoujoKageki:Burn.DESCRIPTION: Cards drawn from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile are upgraded and Exhaust when played.

ShoujoKageki:Position0.NAME: Position 0
ShoujoKageki:Position0.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage for the !M!th time each turn, gain block equal to the damage dealt.
ShoujoKageki:Position0.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage for the !M!th time each turn, gain block equal to the damage dealt.

ShoujoKageki:Position0Tmp.NAME: Position 0
ShoujoKageki:Position0Tmp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Strength, gain additional !M! Strength.
ShoujoKageki:Position0Tmp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain Strength, gain additional !M! Strength.

ShoujoKageki:Pizza.NAME: Pizza
ShoujoKageki:Pizza.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL All enemies lose !ShoujoKageki:SM! Strength. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:HolyStar.NAME: Sacred Stars
ShoujoKageki:HolyStar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When this card is put into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile, reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

ShoujoKageki:Future.NAME: Path Of Future
ShoujoKageki:Future.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your discard pile and put them into your hand.

ShoujoKageki:SeriousStrike.NAME: Serious Strike
ShoujoKageki:SeriousStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL if this card is in ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile at the end of turn, increase damage by !M! for this combat.

ShoujoKageki:CourageStrike.NAME: Courage Strike
ShoujoKageki:CourageStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put !M! *Sideways into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Stretching.NAME: Stretching
ShoujoKageki:Stretching.CHINESE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Put this card into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:WakeUp.NAME: Awake
ShoujoKageki:WakeUp.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your draw pile and put them into your hand. NL Exhaust.
ShoujoKageki:WakeUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your draw pile, discard pile, or ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile and put them into your hand. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:SelectDiscardPile.NAME: Discard Pile
ShoujoKageki:SelectDiscardPile.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your discard pile and put them into your hand.

ShoujoKageki:SelectDrawPile.NAME: Draw Pile
ShoujoKageki:SelectDrawPile.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your draw pile and put them into your hand.

ShoujoKageki:SelectBagPile.NAME: ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile
ShoujoKageki:SelectBagPile.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile and put them into your hand.

ShoujoKageki:NoHesitate.NAME: No Hesitate
ShoujoKageki:NoHesitate.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from your draw pile, discard pile, or hand. Put them into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL Exhaust.

ShoujoKageki:SelectDiscardPile2.NAME: Discard Pile
ShoujoKageki:SelectDiscardPile2.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from your discard pile and put them into your hand.

ShoujoKageki:SelectDrawPile2.NAME: ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile
ShoujoKageki:SelectDrawPile2.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from your draw pile and put them into your hand.

ShoujoKageki:SelectHand2.NAME: Hand
ShoujoKageki:SelectHand2.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@} from your hand and put them into your hand.

ShoujoKageki:NextStage.NAME: Next Stage
ShoujoKageki:NextStage.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this card is put into or removed from ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.
ShoujoKageki:NextStage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this card is moved between piles, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.

ShoujoKageki:NeverRetreat.NAME: Never Retreat
ShoujoKageki:NeverRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile is not empty, play again.

ShoujoKageki:Run03.NAME: Action
ShoujoKageki:Run03.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}. NL Put this card into ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Void.NAME: The Emptiest Person
ShoujoKageki:Void.DESCRIPTION: Destroy your draw pile, then replace it with ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile.

ShoujoKageki:Form.NAME: Awakening Form
ShoujoKageki:Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of each turn, draw cards until your hand is full.
ShoujoKageki:Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, draw cards until your hand is full.

ShoujoKageki:Reproduce.NAME: I, Reproduce
ShoujoKageki:Reproduce.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL For each card run out, add !M! random cards into there.
ShoujoKageki:Reproduce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all cards in ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile. NL For each card run out, add !M! random cards into there.

ShoujoKageki:Promise.NAME: Promise
ShoujoKageki:Promise.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the start of turn, if this card is in ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile, gain [E].
ShoujoKageki:Promise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the start of turn, if this card is in ShoujoKageki:Promise_Pile, gain [E] [E].
